    int interpol_search(int key, int n)
{
Â  int low, high, j;

Â  low = 0;
Â  high = n - 1;

Â  while ((list[high] >= key) && (key > list[low])) {
	Â  j = ((float)(key - list[low]) / (list[high] - list[low])*(high - low)) + low;
	Â  if (key > list[j]) 
			low = j + 1;
	Â  else if (key < list[j]) 
			high = j - 1;
	Â  else 
			low = j;
Â  }
Â  if (list[low] == key) 
		return(low);Â  // íƒìƒ‰ì„±ê³µ
Â  else 
		return -1;Â  // íƒìƒ‰ì‹¤íŒ¨
}

	Â  struct AVLNode *left;
	Â  int key;
	Â  struct AVLNode *right;

{
Â  AVLNode* child = parent->left;
Â  parent->left = child->right;
Â  child->right = parent;
Â  return child;
}

    // LR íƒ€ì…

Â  parent->right = child->left;

Â  return child;
}

    // RR íƒ€ì…

Â Â AVLNode *child = parent->right;
Â  parent->right = child->left;
Â  child->left = parent;
Â  return child;
}

    // RL íƒ€ì…

{
Â  AVLNode* child = parent->left;
Â  parent->left = child->right;
Â  child->right = parent;
Â  return child;

    #define max(a, b) (((a) > (b)) ? (a) : (b)) 
// AVL íŠ¸ë¦¬ ë…¸ë“œ ì •ì˜
typedef struct AVLNode {
Â  struct AVLNode *left;
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  int key;
Â  struct AVLNode *right;

// íŠ¸ë¦¬ì˜ ë†’ì´ë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜
int get_height(AVLNode *node) {
Â  int height = 0;
Â  if (node != NULL)
Â  height = 1 + max(get_height(node->left),
Â  get_height(node->right));
Â  return height;
}
// ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê· í˜•ì¸ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜
int get_balance(AVLNode* node) {
Â  if (node == NULL) return 0;

Â  return get_height(node->left)
Â  - get_height(node->right);
}

AVLNode* create_node(int key) {Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  //ë…¸ë“œ ìƒì„±
Â  AVLNode* node = (AVLNode*)malloc(sizeof(AVLNode));

AVLNode *rotate_right(AVLNode *parent) {

Â  AVLNode *child = parent->right;

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  printf("(after )rotate_left () [ %d ] \n", child->key);

AVLNode* insert(AVLNode* node, int key) {
Â  // ì´ì§„ íƒìƒ‰ íŠ¸ë¦¬ì˜ ë…¸ë“œ ì¶”ê°€ ìˆ˜í–‰
Â  printf("insert(%d, %d) ì‹¤í–‰\n", node, key);
Â  if (node == NULL)
Â  Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  return(create_node(key));
Â  if (key < node->key)
Â  node->left = insert(node->left, key);
Â  else if (key > node->key)
Â  node->right = insert(node->right, key);
Â  elseÂ  // ë™ì¼í•œ í‚¤ëŠ” í—ˆìš©ë˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ
Â  return node;
Â  // ë…¸ë“œë“¤ì˜ ê· í˜•ì¸ìˆ˜ ì¬ê³„ì‚°
Â  int balance = get_balance(node);
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  printf("balance(%d) = %d\n", node->key, balance);
Â  // LL íƒ€ì… ì²˜ë¦¬
Â  if (balance > 1 && key < node->left->key)
Â  return rotate_right(node);
Â  // RR íƒ€ì… ì²˜ë¦¬
Â  if (balance < -1 && key > node->right->key)
Â  return rotate_left(node);
Â  // LR íƒ€ì… ì²˜ë¦¬
Â  if (balance > 1 && key > node->left->key) {
Â  printf("LR íšŒì „ %d \n", node->key);
Â  node->left = rotate_left(node->left);
Â  return rotate_right(node); 
Â  // RL íƒ€ì… ì²˜ë¦¬
Â  if (balance < -1 && key < node->right->key) {
Â  printf("RL íšŒì „ %d \n", node->key);
Â  node->right = rotate_right(node->right);
Â  return rotate_left(node);
Â  }
Â  return node;
}

int main(void) {
Â  AVLNode *root = NULL;
Â  // ì˜ˆì œ íŠ¸ë¦¬ êµ¬ì¶•
Â  root = insert(root, 10);

    2-3 íŠ¸ë¦¬ íƒìƒ‰ í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨

    tree23_search(Tree23Node *root, int key)
{
	if( root == NULL ) Â  // íŠ¸ë¦¬ê°€ ë¹„ì–´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´
	Â  return FALSE;

	else if( key == root->key1 ) Â  // ë£¨íŠ¸ì˜ í‚¤ == íƒìƒ‰ í‚¤
	Â  return TRUE;

	else if( root->type == TWO_NODE ) { Â  // 2-ë…¸ë“œ
	Â  if( key < root->key1 )
	Â  return tree23_search(root->left, key)
	Â  else
	Â  return tree23_search(root->right, key)
	Â  }

	else { Â  // 3-ë…¸ë“œ
	Â  if( key < root->key1 )
	Â  return tree23_search(root->left, key)
	Â  else if( key > root->key2 )
	Â  return tree23_search(root->right, key)
	Â  else
	Â  return tree23_search(root->middle, key)
	Â  }
}
